previous_housing_situation.header: What was the tenant’s housing situation immediately before this letting?

answer_options.3: Tied housing or rented with job
answer_options.19: Fixed term Local Authority General Needs tenancy
answer_options.20: Lifetime Local Authority General Needs tenancy
answer_options.21: Fixed term PRP General Needs tenancy

homelessness.header: Did the tenant experience homelessness immediately before this letting?

answer_options.0: Yes - assessed as homeless by a local authority and owed a homelessness duty. Including if threatened with homelessness within 56 days

last_settled_home.header: What is the tenant’s main reason for leaving?

answer_options.0: Permanently decanted from another property owned by this landlord
answer_options.1: Left home country as a refugee
answer_options.5: Asked to leave by family or friends
answer_options.9: End of assured shorthold tenancy - no fault
answer_options.10: End of assured shorthold tenancy - tenant's fault
answer_options.11: End of fixed term tenancy - no fault
answer_options.12: End of fixed term tenancy - tenant's fault
answer_options.14: Under occupation - offered incentive to downsize
answer_options.16: Property unsuitable because of ill health / disability
answer_options.17: Property unsuitable because of poor condition
answer_options.18: Couldn't afford fees attached to renewing the tenancy
answer_options.20: Couldn't afford rent or mortgage - welfare reforms
answer_options.21: Couldn't afford rent or mortgage - employment
answer_options.22: Couldn't afford rent or mortgage - other
answer_options.23: To move nearer to family / friends / school
answer_options.25: To move to accomodation with support
answer_options.28: Death of household member in last settled accomodation
answer_options.30: Discharged from long stay hospital or similar institution

other_reason_for_leaving_last_settled_ho.header: Please state the reason for leaving last settled home

benefit_cap_spare_room_subsidy.header: Was the reason for leaving because of the benefit cap or removal of the spare room subsidy?

answer_options.1: Yes - removal of the spare room subsidy
answer_options.2: Yes - both the benefit cap and the removal of the spare room subsidy

armed_forces.header: Experience of the UK Armed Forces
Has the tenant ever served in the UK armed forces?

armed_forces_active.check_answer_label: When did they leave the Armed Forces?

answer_options.1: No - they left up to 5 years ago
answer_options.2: No - they left more than 5 years ago

armed_forces_injured.header: Were they seriously injured or ill as a result of their service?
armed_forces_injured.check_answer_label: Has anyone in the household been seriously injured or ill as a result of their service in the armed forces?

armed_forces_partner.header: Was the tenant the spouse or civil partner of someone who served in the UK armed forces?
armed_forces_partner.check_answer_label: Was the tenant the spouse or civil partner of someone who served in the UK armed forces?

answer_options.0: Yes - was the spouse or civil partner of a UK Armed Forces member and have separated within the last 2 years
answer_options.1: Yes - was the spouse or civil partner of a UK Armed Forces member who died within the last 2 years

medical_conditions.header:
Does anyone in the household have any of the following that they expect to last for 12 months or more:
  • Physical Condition
  • Mental Health Condition
  • Other Illness
medical_conditions.check_answer_label: Physical, mental health or illness in the household

pregnancy.header: Is anyone in the household pregnant?

accessibility_requirements.header: Are any of these affected by their condition or illness?

condition_effects.header: Are any of these affected by their condition or illness?

answer_options.condition_effects_vision: Vision - such as blindness or partial sight
answer_options.condition_effects_hearing: Hearing - such as deafness or partial hearing
answer_options.condition_effects_mobility: Mobility - such as walking short distances or climbing stairs
answer_options.condition_effects_dexterity: Dexterity - such as lifting and carrying objects or using a keyboard
answer_options.condition_effects_mental_health: Mental health - such as depression, anxiety, schizophrenia or bipolar
answer_options.condition_effects_social_or_behavioral: Socially or behaviourally - such as those associated with autism spectral disorder (ASD) including Aspergers’ or attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD))

property_relet.check_answer_label: Which type was the property most recently let as?

property_vacancy_reason.header: What is the reason for the property vacancy?

answer_options.3: Relet - tenant evicted due to arrears
answer_options.4: Relet - tenant evicted due to ASB or other reason
answer_options.6: Relet - tenant moved to other social housing provider
answer_options.8: Relet - tenant moved to private sector or other accommodation
answer_options.9: Relet - to tenant who occupied same property as temporary accommodation
answer_options.10: Relet – internal transfer (excluding renewals of a fixed-term tenancy)
answer_options.12: Relet – tenant moved to care home
answer_options.13: Relet – tenant involved in a succession downsize

housing_benefit.header: Is the tenant likely to be in receipt of any of these housing-related benefits?

answer_options.0: Housing Benefit, but not Universal Credit
answer_options.1: Universal Credit with housing element, but not Housing Benefit
answer_options.2: Universal Credit without housing element and no Housing Benefit
answer_options.4: Not Housing Benefit or Universal Credit

rent_frequency.header: Which period are rent and other charges due?

basic_rent.hint_text: Eligible for housing benefit or Universal Credit

service_charge.hint_text: Eligible for housing benefit or Universal Credit

personal_service_charge.header: What is the personal service charge?
personal_service_charge.hint_text: Not eligible for housing benefit or Universal Credit. For example, hot water excluding water rates.

support_charge.hint_text: This is to fund housing-related support services included in the tenancy agreement

total_charge.hint_text: This is the total of rent and all charges

outstanding_rent_or_charges.check_answer_label: After housing benefit and/or housing element of UC payment is received, will there be an outstanding amount for basic rent and/or benefit eligible charges?

outstanding_amount.header: What do you expect the amount to be?
outstanding_amount.hint_text: If the amount is unknown you can estimate

reasonable_preference.check_answer_label: Was the household given Reasonable Preference (i.e. priority) for housing by the Local Authority?
reasonable_preference.header: Was the household given reasonable preference by the local authority?

reasonable_preference_reason.header: Why were they given reasonable preference?

answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_homeless: Homeless or about to lose their home (within 56 days)
answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_unsatisfact: Living in insanitary or overcrowded or unsatisfactory housing
answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_medical_gro: A need to move on medical and welfare grounds (including a disability)
answer_options.reasonable_preference_reason_avoid_hards: A need to move to avoid hardship to themselves or others
